I have a listview with several columns. what i want to know:  what is the event that can capture column/header re-ordering?

For Example: The listview has A, B, C, and D columns
- I move column C to between A and B --> the system will trigger an event and in that event there are codes that store the last order of columns (A,C,B,D)
- I move column A to between B and D --> the system will trigger an event and in that event there are codes that store that last order of columns (C,B,A,D)
etc.

Can anyone help me about this?

Thanks,
